markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Kols (The Oathkeeper)](/Deities.aspx?ID=89)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 126, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 126 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dwarven Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=6)

**Edicts** Seek those that break oaths and enforce just restitution, uphold your promises

**Anathema** Lie, dishonor yourself or your family, shirk your duties, break an oath

**Area of Concern**
Kols holds an important but often overlooked position in dwarven society. The son of Torag, father of the dwarven pantheon, Kols is tasked with exacting punishment on souls who shirk their responsibilities or break sworn oaths and solemn promises. He's a god of contracts and oaths, bonds and alliances, duty and honor.

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)

**Favored Weapon** [Light Hammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=29)

**Domains** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=45), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=32)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=4), [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=46), [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=28)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)

- **4th**
[Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315)

- **8th**
[Unrelenting Observation](/Spells.aspx?ID=351)

</column>
name: Kols (The Oathkeeper)
